sections.heading: Repealed.Section 2-8D-2 - Repealed.Section 2-8D-3 - Repealed.Section 2-8D-4 - Repealed.Section 2-8D-5 - Repealed.Section 2-8D-6 to 2-8D-49 - Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 2002, ch. 98, § 1; repealed by Laws 2021 (2nd S.S.), ch. 7, § 51.

Repeals.— Laws 2021 (2nd S.S.), ch. 7, § 51 repealed 2-8D-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 2002, ch. 98, § 1, relating to short title, effective March 17, 2022. For provisions of former section,seethe 2021 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.

sections.heading: to 2-8D-49 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 2021 (2nd S.S.), ch. 7, § 51 repealed the 2002 Senate Redistricting Act, effective March 17, 2022.
